goal.en: This course is designed to provide insights into planning and conducting research (and performing data analysis) to solve business problems. The subjects consist of research process, study design, measurement, and data analysis techniques.
goal.ch: 本門課程主題包括研究流程、研究設計、測量和實證分析方法。

content.en:
Sampling Logic
Experimental Method
Investigation
Qualitative Field Research
Non-intrusive Research
Evaluation Research
Qualitative Data Analysis
Quantitative Data Analysis
The Logic of Multivariate Analysis
Statistical Analysis
Reading and Writing Social Research Reports
content.ch:
管理學的研究方法
管理研究的測量統計方法

textbook.ch: 組織與管理研究的實證方法(3版)

method.ch: 講授 研討 個別指導 其他
